about_the_game:
This DLC contains a digital 30 pages artbook. In the artbook, you will find a collection of concept art, drawings, and sketches.
You will learn about the creative process of game development!
The artbook can be found in the main game directory.
Atrbook cames in .pdf format.

Also you can find 11 video files in .mp4 format. The video shows the process of drawing each of the cats in the game.
detailed_description:
This DLC contains a digital 30 pages artbook. In the artbook, you will find a collection of concept art, drawings, and sketches.
You will learn about the creative process of game development!
The artbook can be found in the main game directory.
Atrbook cames in .pdf format.

Also you can find 11 video files in .mp4 format. The video shows the process of drawing each of the cats in the game.
